title: Approximations from table of f' part - c

content.question: Use Euler’s method, starting at x = 1 with two steps of equal size, to approximate f(1.4). Show the computations that lead to your answer.

frqParts.text: Use Euler’s method, starting at x = 1 with two steps of equal size, to approximate f(1.4). Show the computations that lead to your answer.

topic.text: 7.5: (BC ONLY) Approximating Solutions Using Euler's Method

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
